name: Tentango
description:
Help octopuses Ocho and Verde find their mutual groove. Look out for the scary spiky pufferfish, and hit the beat for extra points as you lead them over the seafloor! Tentango is a rhythm game for two players.

The leading player signals which way to step (right, left, up) on their turn.

If the following player inputs the same pattern on their turn,
 the couple takes the step!

Different or no input leads to a miss.
Hit the same beat for extra points, and keep up the
good tentaclework for a combo!

Remember to avoid the  pufferfish! Hitting one will break your combo.

Start game - Press space

Player 1: W, A, S, D keys

Player 2: Arrowkeys

Quit: Alt+ F4 on Windows, Cmd + Q on Mac

  • Toni Pesola - programming, game design
  • Elina Eskelinen - 3D, game design
  • Chride Lassheikki - 2D, game design

Tentango was made at Aalto Game Design & Production Game Jam September 2020
Music: Passion Tango by Lena Orsa on Freesound.org, released under CC By 3.0
